PyISY Documentation 
===================

.. image:: http://i0.wp.com/automic.us/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/ve_icon.png

Project Information
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

|  Project Page: `Automicus <http://automic.us/projects/varevents/>`_
|  News: `Automicus Blog <http://automic.us/category/projects/varevents/>`_
|  Source: `GitHub <https://github.com/automicus/VarEvents>`_
|  

Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

The easiest way to install this package is using pip with the command:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install VarEvents

Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~

This package has no additional requirements.
